text:
For some reason, today I remembered this theme... but I couldn't remember from where was it. My process for remembering it was as follow.
It sounded to a old game, so it was from the snes. (I only bought nintendo consoles)
It reminds me to something japanesw, so it was in japanese.
It was against a bad guy,
Eureka!!! It was from the Dragon Ball Z 2 of snes against Cell!!!
After that, I decided to listen it here.
